Reviews.Title: For 11 old Daughter is fine!!
Reviews.Author: wilmer  armas
Reviews.Content: As i Said Above I bought this phone instead of a S3 mini because of the price and it works fine , good reception, almost all games that She wants runs fine without freezing ,good camara  I mena if You are not an Executive who needs Topof the art phone this is a Very Good Choice

Reviews.Title: its not 4GB !!!!
Reviews.Author: jad
Reviews.Content: I'm not that familiar with mobile phones, so i gave to a friend to check it and it seems to be that its 2gb not 4gb as it says im the feature's

Dual-SIM
3.5inch HVGA Touch Screen
1GHz single core processor with 512MB of RAM
